package xiangmu;
public class Ceshi {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        int a = 3;
        int b = 5;
        int c = 0;
        dayin("交换前：");
        dayin("a: " + a);
        dayin("b: " + b);
        c = a; // 通过临时变量c存储变量a中的值，避免被直接覆盖
        a = b;
        b = c;
        dayin("交换后：");
        dayin("a: " + a);
        dayin("b: " + b);
    }
    public static void dayin(Object obj) {
        System.out.println(obj);
    }
} 
交换前：
a: 3
b: 5
交换后：
a: 5
b: 3
